attributes.action: East Cambs District Cycle route proposal
attributes.additional_details: Ely and its surrounding villages need a comprehensive network of safe cycle paths  residents and visitors alike can use. www.elycycle.org.uk have a detailed plan which we would like you to look at and sign here to show your support.

rejection.details: Could you resubmit your e-petition setting out what action you are asking central Government to take?  This is a matter for Cambridgeshire County Council and other local authorities.
